summary: UNICEF, short for the United Nations Children's Fund, is a global organization that helps kids and mothers in need. It was started after World War II to provide emergency aid and has since grown to help in many ways. UNICEF works in almost every country, offering healthcare, education, nutrition, and emergency support. They rely on donations to fund their work, which includes vaccinating millions of children and helping during disasters. This important UN agency has won big awards for its efforts to make the world a better place for children.
title: UNICEF
